code: import React,{useContext}from'react';import{NavLink}from'react-router-dom';import{AuthContext}from'../../context/auth-context';import'./NavLinks.css';var NavLinks=function NavLinks(props){var auth=useContext(AuthContext);var showtime=new Date();var m=showtime.getMonth()+1;var month=showtime.getMonth()+1>=10?"":"0";var showtimesId=showtime.getFullYear()+"-"+month+m+"-"+showtime.getDate();console.log(showtimesId);return React.createElement("ul",{className:"nav-links"},React.createElement("li",null,React.createElement(NavLink,{to:"/movies",exact:true},"Movies")),React.createElement("li",null,React.createElement(NavLink,{to:"/places"},"Theatres")),React.createElement("li",null,React.createElement(NavLink,{to:"/showtime/".concat(showtimesId)},"Show Times")),React.createElement("li",null,React.createElement(NavLink,{to:"/reviews",exact:true},"Reviews")),React.createElement("li",null,React.createElement(NavLink,{to:"/",exact:true},"Home")),React.createElement("li",null,React.createElement(NavLink,{to:"/aboutus",exact:true},"About Us")),React.createElement("li",null,React.createElement(NavLink,{to:"/cart",exact:true},"Cart")));};export default NavLinks;
